snippet: Investigators will analyze the recordings to determine what caused the plane to crash and how the pilots assessed and responded to the emergency....
lead_paragraph: Investigators will analyze the recordings to determine what caused the plane to crash and how the pilots assessed and responded to the emergency.

headline.main: Cockpit Recordings Retrieved in EgyptAir Flight 804 Investigation
headline.print_headline: EgyptAir Flight’s Cockpit Voice Recordings Are Retrieved in Crash Investigation
